I can hear that Frank. They used to bug me about that too until I figured out they wanted me to use it for the pics. Now all they say is that I have alot of them LOL or in reference to my friend who comes thru to us.
   
  Misty

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
           I had a crystal in my pocket, and Chris and I both heard tem ask for the crystal, so I placed it on top of the echo box, and it seemed to clarify the voices.
 
 Frank-S
